items.role: Technologist in Systems Analysis and Development
items.description:
Higher education focused on practical software development.
Key topics:
- Logic and algorithms
- Object-oriented programming
- Software engineering
- Data structures and relational databases
- Software development processes (waterfall, iterative, agile)

Technical course focused on programming fundamentals and infrastructure.
Key topics:
- Front-end (HTML, CSS, JS)
- Back-end with C# and PHP
- Web/mobile apps with Angular and Ionic
- SQL and NoSQL databases
- Arduino, networks, and agile methodologies (Scrum)
